QueryDataSource.Name: dt
QueryDataSource.Sql: select t3.name,t3.inpatient_no, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type is not null and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 总费用, '' 住院总费用其中自付金额, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='01' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 一般医疗服务费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='02' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 一般治疗操作费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='03' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 护理费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='04' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 综合医疗服务类其他费用, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='05' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 病理诊断费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='06' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 实验室诊断费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='07' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 影像学诊断费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='08' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 临床诊断项目费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='09' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 非手术治疗项目费, '' 临床物理治疗费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='10' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 手术治疗费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='11' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 康复费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='13' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 中医治疗费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='15' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 西药费, '' 抗菌药物费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='16' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 中成药费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='17' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 中草药费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='18' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 血费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='19' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 白蛋白类制品费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='20' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 球蛋白类制品费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='21' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 凝血因子类制品费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='22' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 细胞因子类制品费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='23' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 检查用一次性医用材料费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='24' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 治疗用一次性医用材料费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='25' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 手术用一次性医用材料费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='26' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 其他费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='27' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 麻醉费, (select sum(t1.det_item_fee_sumamt) from gzsi_feedetail t1 where t1.med_chrgitm_type='28' and t1.mdtrt_id=t.mdtrt_id) 手术费 from fin_ipr_siinmaininfo t2 left join fin_ipr_inmaininfo t3 on t2.inpatient_no=t3.inpatient_no left join gzsi_feedetail t on t2.reg_no=t.mdtrt_id and t.type_code = '2' and t.memo is null group by t.mdtrt_id,t3.name,t3.inpatient_no

ReportQueryInfo.QueryFilePath: Report\住院医生\住院医保费用设置.xml
